hero.headline: Adventure Starts Here
hero.subheadline: Wilderness skills, arts and crafts, swimming, and archery. Week-long sessions with overnight and day options.
hero.trust_line: ACA Accredited • 20+ Years Running • Limited Spots

items.title: Wilderness Skills
items.desc: Fire building, orienteering, and nature survival.

items.title: Archery & Sports
items.desc: Range time, team games, and friendly competitions.

items.title: Arts & Crafts
items.desc: Pottery, tie-dye, woodworking, and creative projects.

items.title: Morning Activities
items.desc: Wilderness skills, sports, and swimming before lunch.

items.title: Afternoon Adventures
items.desc: Arts, archery, hiking, and free-choice activities.

items.title: Evening Fun
items.desc: Campfire stories, stargazing, and cabin bonding time.

items.quote: My son talks about Trailblazer all year. He's made lifelong friends and gained real confidence.
items.name: Sarah Bennett

items.quote: The counselors are incredible. My daughter felt safe, challenged, and truly herself.
items.name: Michael Chen

items.quote: Third year in a row. Our kids would live here year-round if they could.
items.name: The Rodriguez Family

pricing.headline: Choose Your Adventure
pricing.subheadline: Week-long sessions from June through August.

items.a: 4:1 for day camp, 6:1 for overnight. All counselors are trained, background-checked, and first-aid certified.

items.q: What if my child gets homesick?
items.a: It's normal! Our counselors are trained for it. Most homesickness resolves within 24-48 hours.
Yes. We handle allergies, vegetarian, vegan, kosher, and halal diets with advance notice.
Full refund 30+ days before session. 50% refund 15-29 days. Credit for future sessions within 14 days.

cta_final.headline: Spots Fill Fast
cta_final.description: Registration is open for Summer 2026. Reserve your camper's spot today.
cta_final.trust_line: ACA accredited • Early bird discount available

brand.name: Trailblazer Camp
brand.description: Summer camp adventures for kids ages 7-15.
